response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $10,000 to someone who appreciates its true worth. Considering its significance and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and understanding of quality. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
